title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 64.10 - Sales to and by retailers; sealed containers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 64.10 - Sales to and by retailers; sealed containers

State Regulations

Liquor and wine may be sold to retailers only in sealed
containers as provided by law. Therefore, manufacturers and wholesalers may
sell to retailers, liquor and wine described and identified by warehouse
receipts, only if such liquor or wine is contracted to be sold in sealed
containers as provided by law. Retailers may not sell any liquor or wine
described and identified by warehouse receipts. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
64.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
